==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''{{w|Yasna}}''|ae=𐬫𐬀𐬯𐬥𐬀}} is the Avestan name for a Zoroastrian ceremony. It also refers to the primary body of Avestan liturgical texts.
